title: S3 Ep37: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 21 – State's Secret
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 21 – State's Secret
description:
December 20, 2018 / Jon Cryer hosts this week’s addendum with Susan Simpson, Rabia Chaudry, and guest Jennifer Whitfield from GIP as they closeout Season 3 discussing the Dennis Perry case.

[Image: Rising Daughter Baptist Cemetery at evening]

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Robinhood and Everlane.
